comment.author: 68439219@N06
comment._content:
Brothers Albert and Arthur Heinrich  "Osprey" monoplane built in Baldwin , Long Island , New York spring 1911. ( Brooklyn Daily Eagle August 27,1911: same photo)
The magazine "Aircraft" , September 1911, has the same photo, an advertizement with same photo and an article by the Heinrich's describing this aircraft.   
The Heinrich brothers built their first monoplane in May 1910.
